mapper.select: SELECT C_TYPE, C_PWI_ELEM, fn_get_i18n(N_PWI_ELEM, #{N_LANG}) AS N_PWI_ELEM, C_UI_RESULT, I_SORT FROM t_alg_pwi_elem WHERE C_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{C_TYPE}) AND C_PWI_ELEM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{C_PWI_ELEM}, '%') AND N_PWI_ELEM IN ( SELECT S_CODE FROM t_i18n WHERE S_CODE LIKE 't_alg.%' AND S_LOCALE = #{N_LANG} AND S_DESC LIKE CONCAT('%', #{N_PWI_ELEM}, '%') );
SELECT C_TYPE, C_PWI_ELEM, fn_get_i18n(N_PWI_ELEM, #{N_LANG}) N_PWI_ELEM, C_UI_RESULT, Y_UI_RESULT, Y_ALZ_RESULT, I_SORT FROM t_alg_pwi_elem WHERE C_PWI_ELEM = #{C_PWI_ELEM}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_alg_pwi_elem SET C_TYPE=#{C_TYPE}, N_PWI_ELEM=fn_set_i18n_sb('t_alg', #{C_PWI_ELEM}, #{N_LANG}, #{N_PWI_ELEM}), C_UI_RESULT=#{C_UI_RESULT}, Y_UI_RESULT=#{Y_UI_RESULT}, Y_ALZ_RESULT=#{Y_ALZ_RESULT}, I_SORT=#{I_SORT}, D_MOD_DT=NOW() WHERE C_PWI_ELEM = #{C_PWI_ELEM};
